trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around August 6th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe first time I noticed this ORB was on August 2nd. It looks like a star, but if you know your neighborhood sky like I do, I knew it was something else. THis morning on the way to work, I came down my steps and saw it again. It was in front of my house at a distance. It stayed for about 30 minutes. Planes approaching Hartfield Airport HAD TO SEE THIS. Its no way a Captain of a jetliner did not see this. I grabbed my camera and took shots and video. Just like it did earlier in the week, the light faded away and was GONE. Can someone take a look at these shots and tell me what the hell is this? Please email me your comments. If someone has video enhancing software, I believe you will BE AMAZED at what you see.
